Quotes.Quote: Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
Quotes.Speaker: Thanos

Quotes.Quote: I am a God, you dull creature.
Quotes.Speaker: Loki

Quotes.Quote: Our powers don't decide who we are. We do.
Quotes.Speaker: Barry Allen

Quotes.Quote: Hear me, and rejoice. You are about to die at the hand of the children of Thanos. Be thankful, that your meaningless lives are now contributed to the balance...
Quotes.Speaker: Ebony Maw

Quotes.Quote: Stonekeeper, does this chattering animal speak for you?
Quotes.Speaker: Ebony Maw

Quotes.Quote: What master do I serve? What am I supposed to say? Jesus?
Quotes.Speaker: Star-Lord

Quotes.Quote: Yeah, I'll do you one better - WHO is Gamora?
Quotes.Speaker: Tony Stark

Quotes.Quote: I'm gonna ask you this one time, where is Gamora?
Quotes.Speaker: Star-Lord

Quotes.Quote: I'll do YOU one better! WHY is Gamora?
Quotes.Speaker: Drax

Quotes.Quote: You're embarrassing me in front of the wizards.
Quotes.Speaker: Tony Stark

Quotes.Quote: Madness, as you know, is a lot like gravity. All it takes is a little push.
Quotes.Speaker: The Joker

Quotes.Quote: What doesn't kill you makes you stranger.
Quotes.Speaker: The Joker

Quotes.Quote: Only together, can we bring about my return.
Quotes.Speaker: Savitar

Quotes.Quote: Vengeance has confusmed you. It's consuming them. I am done letting it consume me.
Quotes.Speaker: T'Challa
